website_summaries.verdict: Sony's WiFi-enabled Blu-ray player is a solid choice if you're on a budget — but there are better options available.
pros: Includes built-in streaming apps like Netflix and Hulu
Includes a USB port for connecting and playing your own digital content
cons: The included tiny remote is hard to use, and playing discs is especially noisy

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up which was important to a tech challenged person like me. It took ten minutes from plug in to set up and that included adding channels. UPDATE - The wireless started to fail after just a few weeks of use. I had to return and hook up my Roku again which has an excellent wireless with no problems at all. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Bixby

customer_reviews.title: Failed the second time I went to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked only 1 time .... right after I got it. Was gone for a month, came back and went to use it. Dead, no function. On light shows .... can't turn off or open the tray. Rebooted several times, changed the batteries on the remote. Nothing. Made cheaply, poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: James Lindbloom

customer_reviews.title: Are you buying a dvd player?
customer_reviews.text: I am a man who has a lot of dvds, blu-ray dvds and music cds. I can play them on this player, that's right even the music cds. I love it and it was easy to set up. Actual very simple and fast. Took my old one out and put this one in. If you had to start from scratch an install it, it come with every thing including a hi speed cable for the tv. The only thing you might have to buy is a cable for the internet. I hit the jackpot when I ordered this I bought two. Looks good and plays great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Both Blu-Rays and DVDs look spectacular on the player. And the Wifi connected fast without any issues. This is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Tiny size but impressive performance
customer_reviews.text: A cute little Blu ray player, very small but big in performance. I can now place a hold on a DVD and return to my original place the next day, something I could not do with my former Sony player. The remote is also very tiny. Works very well using an ethernet cable which is more reliable for me than wireless. Has every service imaginable available on the Home screen provided you are a subscriber to that service. There is a bit of a delay getting connected to whatever you want to watch and requires multiple clicks but eventually you get to where you want.
customer_reviews.author: takeeta

customer_reviews.title: sound is great and picture quality is
customer_reviews.text: compact and proficient player, sound is great and picture quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Langford

customer_reviews.title: Not great at streaming video program selection.
customer_reviews.text: The new Netflix format moves very slowly on this player. Amazon Prime Video is better, but, still, it's a pain to pick a show. Once it's playing, everything is fine. I don't know if it's a memory problem, a programing problem, or a problem on the other end that clogs this machines ability to process. The Blue-Ray Disc player is flawless and hook up is easy, as is set up. The small footprint is awesome. I wish, however, that I'd have gotten a machine that manages streaming video better.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: the unit is stuck, wont turn off, wont eject disc, nothing fixes it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month. Then I could not get the unit to turn off. the green light just stays on. even after disconnecting the power cord. When i plugged it back in the units green light lit up but none of the remote buttons or eject work. I tried all the remedies listed and suggested by Sony and others. From an internet search I see that many others have had the same problem. I no longer have the box ext so I cant even return it. I am so disappointed at having wasted my money. Like a dummy I got another one and it did the same thing...JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: just junk
customer_reviews.text: Quit working almost as soon as I got it. Watching a movie on prime and it says 'file is too large and will be terminated' few seconds later it stops working, restart, finish movie maybe.Now it won't turn on or off nor eject a disk. 91 days old today. Got to watch five dvds. Not a good deal. Disappointed with Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Ruisinger

customer_reviews.title: Stop working within days.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for only a few days when the whole thing just stop working. It had to be returned. Then I had to buy another one that was more expensive. I just wish that products were made to last like they used to be. I would stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: F- Booooooo. Awful streaming.
customer_reviews.text: Hangs up, locks up, buffers, locks up again... I have to unplug and reboot. TERRIBLE streaming. Good picture quality once it gets going (if it does). Takes forever... remote inputs kick in like a minute later. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: A Blu Ray player that works!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect. We just needed a blu ray player because our Xbox One only plays blu ray disks one out of every 200 tries. Haha. The Sony Blu Ray player is super small, light and has such a great picture. It shipped quick and cane with an HDMI cable and micofiber cleaning cloth. Very nice! 👌
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for a Year, and then Died
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a year.. About 2-3 weeks ago it wouldn't access the available wi-fi apps...like Amazon, Hulu, etc. I didn't just buy it to be a dvd player, but also so we could watch our Amazon and Hulu shows. We've tried everything..unplugging, resetting, everything..and nothing has improved. A little upset because I spent around $100 on something that didn't make it past the 1 year mark. I'll be looking elsewhere for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-ray player at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Blu Ray player!!! It's nice and compact and works great! Setup was super easy too! It was an even better deal because the seller threw in an HDMI cable with it so I didn't have to buy one separately. This has to be one of the best Blu-ray players out there!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kramisen

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it will fail.
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews on how bad this unit is for reliability. Unfortunately, only after I'd bought it. Worked great while it worked, but failed after ten months; wi-fi wouldn't connect, then locked up entirely. I still have two months of warranty left on this, but other reviewers said the replacement did the same thing. Waste of a hundred dollars. You'd think Sony could come up with a reliable unit that's not much more than a Roku with a DVD player attached. Buy at your own peril.
customer_reviews.author: Tony-O

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I used to have my TV near my computer and hooked it up second monitor style so I could watch Netflix and the like. In my new home, they are in different rooms so I wanted something that could pick up WiFi. This does that but is twitchy and inconsistent. It locks up, loses the log-ins randomly, and says there isn't enough bandwidth for Amazon Prime a lot of the time. I have to unplug it to reset it. It also won't allow you to add apps (I wanted to subscribe to DC Universe). It's okay but I expected more from it.
customer_reviews.author: Katana Rogue

customer_reviews.title: People need to be made aware of this problem.
customer_reviews.text: Remote will not connect Sanyo TV, there are no number listed for Sanyo. Sanyo is not even listed in you setup page. Unit will not connect to X finite remote.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Blue Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, wanted one that was small and easy to transport and connect to any tv and this was the one. Used it on my In-Laws tv via a HDMI cable. Small and light weight the major Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hula are already programed in. For a very reasonable price, and I have 2 other older Sony Blue Rays, this one works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Oldster

customer_reviews.title: this is our 3rd one in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: So this is our third one in three years. the first 2 stopped streaming properly and this one the power port on the unit broke. but this internal part isn't covered even though it was plugged in in July of 2019 and not moved until 4 days ago when I unplugged it, walked it down the hall and tried plugging it back in again. in that the inner plastic piece broke and the unit never worked again. So they aren't willing to help. 3rd strike as far as I'm concerned. I wouldn't recommend using these to anyone, even someone I hated and want to make miserable..... A disheartened ex sony customer
customer_reviews.author: Allison Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don't make the same mistake twice
customer_reviews.text: I had so much trouble trying to connect to my Wi-Fi I actually had to bring my Wi-Fi box within 5 feet for it to pick up my Wi-Fi when I had it on plane Netflix it would drop off Wi-Fi I should have known better I had bought one of these at Walmart a year ago I had the same trouble with that one my Wi-Fi booster box sets within 3 feet to make it work but this one I returned I will not buy this product again. I bought a Roku and it works great I'm going to buy another one for my other TV and get rid of the other Sony box I have.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Just my luck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have Hulu on July 11th. The return date was August 11th. Well, guess what. On August 14th Hulu pulled its services off this product! Then what was the point of buying this. I can’t even return it now. Such crap. The player itself is sleek and has been working great. Totally pissed about the Hulu app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It is small and perfect. I wish there was a way to add newer apps like Disney Plus, that is the only reason for a 4 star. I asked Sony and they said to get a Roku or Fire stick for that. Otherwise it has stuff like Prime Videos, Netflix, Hulu, You Tube. It plays both DVD and Blue Ray. I have some digital movies saved on a flash drive so I can easily plug it in the usb in front and makes this unit worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freezes up
customer_reviews.text: Had this about 9 months and it's stopped working. Would freeze up but could reset by unplugging. Now that doesn't even work. Green light is on but no response from the unit itself or the remote. Now reading many reviews saying the same thing and the overall rating has dropped since i initially purchased it. Disappointed I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: A Monticello

customer_reviews.title: Why the bad reviews?
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an older (7 years!) Sony blu-ray that tried to eat a blu-ray. It was easy to install although the interface for logging in to online options is tediously outdated. I’ve unplugged and moved it a few times without having to enter my password a second time. It does take a bit of time for a disc to be recognized- in other words, not as instantaneous as most folks would like...but not ridiculously do. I would take a half star away for the interface, but overall, I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RevB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up if you have Wi-Fi it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up if you have Wi-Fi it was easy to hook onto the Wi-Fi my problem is it has a tendency to Jump Around a little bit that's probably just me in my selection playing DVD or blurays will just go blank have to start over. Won't buy again Add on. If your wi fi blips as wi fi does machine goes out and won't restart itself. You have to do it. And this happens even when you are playing a DVD or blu ray
customer_reviews.author: kathy p

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: It is becoming hard to find Blu-ray players, This unit is a fine compact device. Sony created the medium, they should not abandon their customers. Sony is a great innovator as a company, but they have a short attention span,
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Video

customer_reviews.title: Nice but has glitches
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great. Easy to setup. However if for whatever reason it just shuts off out of the blue, I have to constantly reset the Wi-Fi then sign in to all my apps again. It's really annoying. I wouldn't mind if it had an option to reconnect automatically. It also freezes sometimes for no reason which will cause an automatic shut off then the aforementioned happens. I'll probably buy a new bluray soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its an outdated DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Called Hulu since I couldn't live stream Tv with it, but the app was already built in so I was confused. Hulu said its an outdated device I said i just bought. I looked at back it said 2007! Its an old outdated Dvd player Technology. Dont waste your money. I ended up getting Sony new version at Target has Blue Tooth stereo same price 11 years newer!
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: A fresh hell almost every day
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm. Let's see: freezing that sometimes needed turning off, sometimes unplugging; frequently required re-entry of Netflix and Prime subscription info; sometimes would not recognize DVD disk in player; sometimes, with DVD disk in machine, drawer would not open and required different buttons and/or unplugging every time. And that's just what comes to mind right now. Bought it to replace an earlier similar Sony model but this one was even worse. The aggravation factor just kept climbing. However, when it was working, picture was fine and so was the sound for both streaming and DVDs
customer_reviews.author: wbtinoak

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and FINALLY our movies with play the entire way through! I had another highly rated brand blue at player in two rooms of my house but they started messing up after a year. I’m hoping Tj’s one will last a lot longer. We’ve had for a few months now and so far so good. The only issues I have with it is that the remote buttons are labeled very differently than what I’m used to and I can only literally use it to control my blu Ray player. If I want to switch to the tv or even just turn the volume up on the movie I have to use other remotes. Super annoying but I’ll deal.
customer_reviews.author: pblove

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has hardly worked since the day I got it We have great internet service. This thing never stays “connected “ even during the middles of shows. Remote works 40% of the time when it comes to operating the internet watching. Disc aspect works fine, not the smart features however. Wish I had returned it early on when I still had the chance
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I liked this one
customer_reviews.text: The bells and whistles on a BluRay player are hard to overstate. I liked this one, but the lower right quadrant of the screen flickered.
customer_reviews.author: N8 H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well packaged and very easy to install. I really appreciated the bundle that included the HDMI cable. I didn't have to go out and buy one. I haven't had a lot of time to use it yet but seems to work perfectly. Also really like the WI-FI interface, I don't have change the source on the TV. When you turn on the player it automatically switches to the internet options screen with a dvd icon to select if you want to watch a DVD. All of the up to date internet apps are all together on one screen. NICE!
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blu ray player I was a little hesitant to get another Sony because the one we have in our living room is a little frustrating sometimes with how slow it takes to start but this one is great! Great picture quality runs very smoothly, very easy to connect to our WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Product Lockup
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it should except when it sits for a few days without usage. It seems to lock up and has to be unplugged and plugged back in to reset it. Nothing on the unit or remote will function when it locks up. This has happened 6 times to me already since I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyT1950

customer_reviews.title: To work properly
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the item stopped working properly after a couple of weeks It is a great item if it works properly
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: The Sony had issues with internet speed. It continued to drop the connection while all my other connected items don't have issues. Also, with more than one HDMI device hooked up, the Sony will freeze and have to be unplugged to reset. I was very dissapointed but see that others have had the same issues. I like Sony and hope they get these issues resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Little box, big sound...
customer_reviews.text: I've only recently learned that these little players existed. I'm sure there's better stuff out there but for what comes in this kit suits our needs just fine. I like the video upscaling and sound that makes my TV go boom like I'm in a movie theater. I also really like the fact that everything you need comes in a kit. To the seller, thanks for putting that together. Amazon prime video here too so finally we're able to get a little extra out of our annual prime fees. Thanks for everything. I'd recommend... 😉👍
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Good bluray player, great picture
customer_reviews.text: I have had bad luck with bluray players lately and this is no exception, the quality and picture are great but it freezes like all my others, my others were samsung and I decided to try Sony having good experiences with their products in the past
customer_reviews.author: stephen fritzges

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Slow to operate and temperamental. One of the reasons we purchased this unit was that it is a "SMART" unit that streams services such as Netflix and HULU. Now Sony and HULU have had a problem and the unit no longer supports HULU. THAT IS WHY WE BOUGHT IT. Goodbye Sony, Hello ROKU.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I figured if spent extra I'd receive quality, wrong!! This thing is junk. Constant wireless connectivity issues, my previous player never had issues. At least once a week it freezes requiring it be unplugged and thus apps have to be readded and all passwords reentered. Piece of junk, I feel like driving over it with my truck. PS. - this review comes after nearly 2 years of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: tom peters

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very quickly, thanks! Excellent value. Unit is smaller than I expected, which is a plus for me. At first startup the picture was jittery and would pop out momentarily every few seconds. I tried replacing my existing HDMI cable (which worked fine on my previous DVD player) with the HDMI cable that came bundled with the new Sony -- no more jitters! Perfect picture and sound. The streaming Apps selection is good but the interface is not quite as fast to load as my AppleTV unit, but works well. I bought the Sony for the Blu-Ray, not the apps, so they're a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up. Wifi was not as strong as I hoped. I had to move the until around the room until I got connected. Works great. The only con is that it really needs the more popular apps. I was disappointed to see there was no YouTube TV, Hulu or Disney + and no way to add more apps. It does have Netflix and Amazon Video but we equally use the other streaming apps.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B Castoldi

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Internet Connection; No Delays; Great for Netflix!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a Bluray player that could connect to internet WITHOUT being hard wired. I have been very happy with my purchase. Easy to use, internet connection runs smoothly. No resetting, no delays. Basically use for Netflix and occasionally YouTube; I haven't had any issues with either one. I do wish there was a sleep timer, or some kind of hibernation that would kick in after a couple hours of no activity. That's the only downside for me. However, it's minor and I will be purchasing another one to replace my daughter's Bluray player so that she can access Netflix in her room!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine K.

customer_reviews.title: Sony quality Blu-ray
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of connections which is two (2) HDMI and the power. Setup is straight forward, I made the complete connection and setup in about 10 minutes........... Great picture and features, comes with Apps Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Finicky connection
customer_reviews.text: It started out very nice but 6 months later I am having to unplug it for a minute almost before every use, it is very finicky and does not want to connect to my internet even though I have a wired connection.
customer_reviews.author: caleb kulp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a few times and, it completely stopped working. Device. Comes on and displays Sony Blue Ray logo, that’s it no controls work and can’t even remove Blue Ray I last watched. Tried power reboot nothing works. Will stick to Samsung products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: rml

customer_reviews.title: Check ricing before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhere impressed with the wireless feature being able to hook up to YouTube and Amazon but disappointed that there are no RCA jasks for sound output to my wireless headphone setup. Also I thought I was getting a good deal through Amazon. I went to Walmart and found the same exact unit for $50 less.
customer_reviews.author: Alan hovious

customer_reviews.title: Sony Blue ray.
customer_reviews.text: Good price and I already have two. It is convenient on TV that are not smart TV. I just go through the menu and select NetFlix or my Amazon Prime to watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: TA Ling

customer_reviews.title: Too light in weight.
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this five stars but, it’s too small and way too light. This tells me there’s no real quality inside. Push a button and the whole unit pushes away unless using the very tiny remote. The picture quality could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Lodato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My old one stop working so I ordered a new one I could not believe how fast I receive it everything was perfect and the same one my son bought but mine did not cost that much as his so I’m happy thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product looked used
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with an HDMI cable as advertised and when we opened the box this product looked like it was used. Therefore, we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Gamba

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good unit. Just don’t watch many movies, and also have Fire Tv. Haven’t really used this but it’s always good to have it on hand for DVD rental
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BluRay Heaven, just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted, plus some. Works great and jives well will my Samsung TV. Couldn’t ask for a better Blu-ray player IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: way to get netflix  and prime as Wii does not work anymore
customer_reviews.text: All of a sudden our Wii would not work with Netflix, and we didn't want to spend the big bucks buying a new tv when ours was perfectly fine. This blueray player fit the bill and we can now enjoy Netflix and prime
customer_reviews.author: Elysa

customer_reviews.title: Player works fine, but doesn't play Bluray
customer_reviews.text: I cannot see how to correct my error, but please cancel my prior message that I did not receive this item. I DID receive it! I was confused about the interaction I had with Sony. I apologize for the misleading message. Ray Young 717-682-2141
customer_reviews.author: Ray Young

customer_reviews.title: Small unit
customer_reviews.text: Small and a bit light weight though good product. Wireless was easily programed This was replacement for previous Sony unit which was damaged during move. It cost less and was a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent H.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Pure Junk. Stopped working in less than a year. It doesn't recognize any disc we put in it. I expect more from a $100 player.
customer_reviews.author: David Larson

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Time
customer_reviews.text: Connected it, tried to access the internet via WiFi, and got a message that it needed a firmware update, and began downloading it. But it failed multiple times, and Sony's website said to download the files to a thumb drive, which I did. But the unit doesn't have a USB port, and after a huge hassle getting through to online chat help (2 days!), the barely literate in English agent, Scott, said I would have to buy a CD from Sony for $16. That did it; it's going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Plays both styles of DVD's and has options for streaming. I would buy this unit again
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R. Wade

customer_reviews.title: So many KNOWN ISSUES and no ways to fix them
customer_reviews.text: We never write reviews but this product is terrible and all SONY says is "that is a known issue and we can send you a new one". The system freezes all the time and resets every time we turn it back on. It wont play AMAZON Prime. And again, their response is this is a known issue but the only "fix" is to reset the box but the system continues to run poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kane

customer_reviews.title: reaonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 24 months without problems. The device stopped supporting Hulu, which was a disappointment but otherwise as others have said you can’t beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Troop

customer_reviews.title: Great player. I miss my PS3
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace streaming and BD capabilities when my PS3 died. This one works much better than the Samsung BD player I tried first, but it still has some glitches/loading/pauses during streaming hulu and amazon, which I did not have with my very old and now deceased PS3. I would recommend this product for both streaming and BD playing, as a good option versus spending much more on a higher-powered game system (e.g., PS4, XBox), unless you want to play the games.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Norton

customer_reviews.title: Careful of the HDMI cable
customer_reviews.text: My work has this blue ray player that is used 5 days a week, 10-12 hours per day straight. Plays great! The HDMI cable did go out on us about 2 months after purchasing but that is an easy fix. I just purchased one myself for my mother on the law... with an extra HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara McKnight

customer_reviews.title: As someone who uses my computer, not a TV, I wish it could've connected to my computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Comes with a remote and many cords, which is nice. I was only disappointed that it wouldn't connect to my computer as someone who doesn't use a TV, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Operate
customer_reviews.text: This disc player was easy to hook up and simply to operate. Remote works great. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: Not a good DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: The wireless feature has become intermittent. It says WiFi is connected but no apps will launch. I’ve reset the the box twice and still won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Savitt

customer_reviews.title: Sony BDP-S3700 Blu-Ray Disc Player
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, worked as advertised, great picture and all at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Grandparent IC

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend purchasing this
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this purchase but from the second day we had it we have had problems. The only way to get it to work is to unplug it and restart it every time. Otherwise it won’t connect to the internet or open any apps. When you press the power button, it won’t turn off so you aren’t forced to in plug and replug it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina van Ee

customer_reviews.title: Everything Great - except
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble connecting wireless Wi-Fi. Figured it out on the third try - great!
customer_reviews.author: Loyd Eskildson

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery of product, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Everything that was promised was included in the package. It worked right out of the package. Instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: 53Classic

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: I keep having to enter my info for Neflix, Prime, etc. The unit also crashes every now and then. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY, DOSENT LAST!
customer_reviews.text: This player sucks!!!! We got this at the end of March; it is now the middle of June and we need a new one. It keeps turning it's self off. And after the last update, the Amazon and Netflix buttons don't work: the apps don't even show up on the home screen anymore. NEVER BUYING SONY AGAIN!!!! What a waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice blue ray nice price

product_meta.title: Sony BDP-S3700 Blu-Ray Disc Player with Built-in Wi-Fi + Remote Control + Xtech High-Speed HDMI Cable w/Ethernet + HeroFiber Gentle Cleaning Cloth
product_meta.description:
BDP-S3700 Blu-ray Disc player with new super Wi-Fi technology 
Access from 300+ entertainment services, play PlayStation Now games and Blu-Ray movies-all from one device. Upscale content to near HD quality, while also enjoying premium sound and stronger, faster Wi-Fi connectivity with MIMO compatibility. Share mobile content on your TV with Miracast screen mirroring and access photos, videos or music through the front USB port. A world of entertainment begins here. 
Bring your viewing experience to life with our broad and vivid TRILUMINOS color palette. Exclusive to Sony and optimized for use with accompanying TRILUMINOS TVs, it ensures that hard-to-reproduce reds, aqua blues, and emerald greens are all beautifully displayed so that landscapes and seascapes appear more realistic.
Use your tablet or smartphone (Android or iOS) to control your Blu-ray Disc player and learn more about what you’re watching with the TV SideView app.
Connect to your home network with DLNA: Digital Living Network Alliance (DLNA) is an industry-wide standard for sharing data over a home network. This makes it easier to stream and transfer your favorite music, films, and pictures between your DLNA-supported devices—including TVs, PCs, portable servers, and gaming consoles.
